question: Are ther any duas to read to get up for Fajr Namaaz with out the use of alarm clock because it disturbs others?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Verse 109 / 110 Surah 18 ? Surah Kahf should be recited before sleeping intending in your mind what time you wish to wake up, having full trust on Allah. It has been the experience of our pious predecessors that this was very effective in awakening a person who read it at the actual time desired.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
